title: Assert spawned processes terminating in distributed tests
body_html:
Summary: In the case where a process got stuck and timed out on joining, we would see a None != 1 assertion error in the code path where the exit statuses are compared. This implies that the first process exited with exit code 1 and another one didn't exit at all. With this commit the error message is more descriptive.

Differential Revision: D10785266
